article_title: Flash Point panel remembers BBJ… They also talk Obamacare & the Confederate flag
article_text:
The Supreme Court of the United States decided that everyone who qualifies as having low income is eligible for Obamacare. That affects 87,000 people in Oklahoma alone.

Please enable Javascript to watch this video

After the shooting in Charleston, South Carolina, there have been demands for the Confederate flag to be taken down in southern states.

Please enable Javascript to watch this video

Craig Humphreys, voice of WWLS, remembers working closely with Bob Barry, Jr.

Please enable Javascript to watch this video

Craig Humphreys and the panel sign off with respects to BBJ.

Please enable Javascript to watch this video

Report a typo
